title: Capital Returns Program Expansion
summary: Apple authorized an additional $90B share repurchase and raised dividends despite macro headwinds, signaling confidence in long-term cash generation and services growth.

title: Price Cuts to Defend EV Share
summary: Tesla reduced Model 3/Y prices globally to maintain market share, prioritizing scale and software revenue over short-term margins.

title: Activision Blizzard Acquisition
summary: Microsoft closed the $68.7B Activision deal to strengthen its gaming and AI ecosystem, focusing on subscription flywheel and cloud integration.
